title: League of Legends
description: League of Legends, commonly referred to as League, is a 2009 multiplayer online battle arena video game developed and published by Riot Games. Inspired by Defense of the Ancients, a custom map for Warcraft III, Riot's founders sought to develop a stand-alone game in the same genre. Players assume the role of a 'champion' with unique abilities and battle against a team of other player-controlled champions. The goal is usually to destroy the opposing team's 'nexus', a structure located at the heart of a base protected by defensive structures.

title: Bioshock
description: BioShock is a first-person shooter video game set in the dystopian underwater city of Rapture. Players take on the role of Jack, a survivor of a plane crash who discovers the decaying city and its inhabitants, who have been genetically modified and driven insane. The game combines a compelling narrative with elements of horror and features a unique blend of combat and strategic gameplay, where players can use both conventional weapons and special abilities gained through genetic modifications.

title: Dota II
description: Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game developed and published by Valve. Players join a team of five and assume control of unique heroes, each with their own abilities and play styles, to destroy the enemy team's ancient structure while defending their own. The game is known for its complex strategies, extensive hero pool, and the need for teamwork and coordination.

title: Doom Eternal
description: Doom Eternal is a first-person shooter game developed by id Software and published by Bethesda Softworks. Players control the Doom Slayer, an ancient warrior battling the demonic forces of Hell. The game emphasizes fast-paced combat, featuring a variety of weapons, abilities, and upgrades, along with an array of challenging enemies and bosses.

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Forza Horizon 5 is an open-world racing game developed by Playground Games and published by Xbox Game Studios. Set in a fictional representation of Mexico, the game offers a diverse and vibrant environment for players to explore, with a wide variety of cars to drive and races to participate in. The game features dynamic weather systems, seasons, and extensive customization options.

title: Fallout 4
description: Fallout 4 is an action role-playing game developed by Bethesda Game Studios and published by Bethesda Softworks. Set in a post-apocalyptic open world, players control the 'Sole Survivor' who emerges from a long-term cryogenic stasis in Vault 111. The game features a vast world to explore, engaging quests, and the ability to build and manage settlements.

title: Spider-Man
description: Spider-Man is an action-adventure game developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Players control Spider-Man as he navigates an open-world version of New York City, combating crime and iconic villains. The game features fluid web-swinging mechanics, engaging combat, and a compelling narrative that explores both the heroics of Spider-Man and the life of Peter Parker.

title: Mafia: Definitive Edition
description: Mafia: Definitive Edition is a remake of the 2002 video game Mafia, developed by Hangar 13 and published by 2K Games. Set in the 1930s, players control Tommy Angelo, a taxi driver turned mobster, as he rises through the ranks of the Salieri crime family. The game features an open-world environment, a gripping narrative, and updated graphics and gameplay mechanics.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an action role-playing video game developed and published by CD Projekt. The story takes place in Night City, an open world set in the Cyberpunk universe.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an action role-playing game developed and published by CD Projekt. Players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter known as a Witcher, as he searches for his missing adopted daughter.

title: Overwatch
description: Overwatch is a team-based multiplayer first-person shooter developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment. Players are assigned into two teams of six, with each player selecting from a roster of over 30 characters, known as heroes.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games. The game is set in 1899 in a fictionalized representation of the Western, Midwestern, and Southern United States.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Assassin's Creed Valhalla is an action role-playing video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is the twelfth major installment and the twenty-second release in the Assassin's Creed series.

title: Fortnite
description: Fortnite is an online video game developed by Epic Games and released in 2017. It is available in three distinct game mode versions that otherwise share the same general gameplay and game engine.

title: Hades
description: Hades is a roguelike dungeon crawler video game developed and published by Supergiant Games. The game is set in the Greek underworld and follows Zagreus, the son of Hades, as he attempts to escape the underworld to reach Mount Olympus.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a sandbox video game developed by Mojang. The game was created by Markus 'Notch' Persson in the Java programming language. Following several early private testing versions, it was first made public in May 2009 before fully releasing in November 2011.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild is an action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo. It is a part of the Legend of Zelda series and is set at the end of the series timeline.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the first main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series since 2008's Grand Theft Auto IV.
